page.title: 02Local Clubs & Organisations
page.content: At any one time over{25}of the following{clubs and organisations}are active and affiliated to{New Deer {Community Association}: Agricultural Assoc.;Mothers & Toddlers Badminton Club ;Oldwhat Community Bowling Club ;Parents & Teachers Brownies ;Picnic Committee CairnbannoCommunity;Playgroup Croquet Club ;Royal Brit.Legion Dancers ;St.Kanes Church Disco Club ;Scouts (& Cubs) Football Club ;Senior Citizens Friendship Club ;Thursday Slimmers Girl Guides ;Whist Club Guild ;Womens Rural Inst. Indoor Bowlers ;Young Farmers Club Judo Club ;Youth Club {*********************** The village also has an active Farmers Discussion Group and Womens Voluntary Service.
